entries.title_d: Finish the repair and recovery of the Imperial transport by bringing them safely to the station in Endor.
entries.title: Endor System: The Long Way Home
entries.thanks_2: We are almost through, just hold them a bit longer.
entries.taunt_3: What research components have a radioactive signature that large?
entries.taunt_1: You Imperials are always up to some problems.
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 Captain I have a relay from the Fleet. A Nova Courier has come out of hyperspace not far from your location.  They request that you make a sortie against this target if the opportunity presents itself in light of your current obligations to the Transport.  There are no overriding priorities, the choice is up to you. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.shields_depleted: Shield energies have been drained, our hull is vulnerable.
entries.reason_3: I don't expect those Rebels have given up already.
entries.reason_1: Good to see you made it through ok Captain.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet the transport coming in from the Naboo System.
entries.quest_location_d: Entering from the nearest hyperspace point the freighter will make their way to the Endor Station and safety.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the Imperial transport, guarding against further Rebel Assault.
entries.panic_2: More Rebels.  Not sure if they are from around here or they tracked us from Naboo.
entries.hull_half: Hull integrity is at critical levels.
entries.goodbye_3: Shipment delivered almost on time even.
entries.goodbye_2: This is Transport IZ-5W44 signing off.
entries.goodbye_1: Thanks Captain, I knew you would see us through.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Calculated rendezvous point locked in. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: \#pcontrast3 Transport: < \#pcontrast1 This operation is a bust. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 I will have to notify Imperial Command about this failure.  They were counting on this shipment. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: The freighter is safely on its way to the Research Station.
entries.autorewardbody: Completion Bonus: The Long Way Home (10000)
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile craft detected on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Endor Station: < \#pcontrast1 The transport will be joining you shortly. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: I am not hanging around here with no escort.
